summary: Financial management app with unified backend, AI-powered budgeting system, intelligent insights hub, and AdSense integration
architectural_notes: Motoko backend serves as single source of truth for all financial data
Real-time data sharing between all modules (dashboard, transactions, goals, analytics, AI budget planner)
Global AI assistant reads all backend data to provide data-driven insights
Advanced AI budget planner fully integrated with all other modules
Google AdSense code integrated in head section across all pages

existing_features.title: Verify that the Google AdSense script with publisher ID 'pub-5050836253831761' is correctly integrated in the <head> section of frontend/index.html and confirm it loads on all application pages
Create a dedicated AI Insights Hub page accessible from the main navigation where users can ask natural language questions about their financial data
Integrate the AI Insights Hub with the unified Motoko backend to read all user data including transactions, goals, budgets, preferences, and analytics in real-time
Replace the existing budget planner interface with an Advanced AI Budget System that includes mandatory input fields: Monthly Income, Rent/EMI, Food, Travel, Utilities, and Existing Loans
Add optional input fields to the Advanced AI Budget System: Entertainment, Subscriptions, Shopping, Insurance, and Investments
Implement AI-powered smart category allocation suggestion that analyzes user input and recommends optimal expense distribution across categories
Implement automatic savings percentage calculation that determines optimal savings based on income, mandatory expenses, and optional spending
Implement emergency fund calculation that recommends emergency fund target based on monthly expenses and displays current progress
Implement overspending alert system that detects when expenses exceed budget allocations and notifies users
Implement dynamic budget adjustment capability that adapts budget recommendations based on actual spending patterns and income changes
Implement end-of-month balance prediction that forecasts remaining balance based on current spending trends and upcoming expenses
Implement Student/Professional adaptive mode that tailors budget recommendations and financial advice based on user's life stage selection
Ensure the Advanced AI Budget System stores all budget data in the unified Motoko backend and integrates with existing transactions, goals, and analytics modules for real-time data synchronization

new_feature_requests.summary: Verify AdSense code is properly added in head section across all pages
Create dedicated AI insights hub where users can ask natural language questions using all backend data

Replace basic budget planner with Advanced AI Budget System with mandatory inputs (Monthly Income, Rent/EMI, Food, Travel, Utilities, Existing Loans) and optional inputs (Entertainment, Subscriptions, Shopping, Insurance, Investments)

Implement AI budget features: smart category allocation, auto savings percentage, emergency fund calculation, overspending alerts, dynamic budget adjustment, end-of-month balance prediction, Student/Professional adaptive modes
Ensure unified backend data architecture with complete real-time integration across dashboard, transactions, goals, analytics, and AI budget system
